sections.description:
Ultra-dynamic GA4 tracking system with payment method & sale price tracking for WooCommerce.

Features

  • Automatic Product Tracking - Tracks view_item_list, view_item, select_item
  • Cart Events - add_to_cart, remove_from_cart, view_cart
  • Checkout Events - begin_checkout, add_shipping_info, add_payment_info
  • Purchase Tracking - Complete purchase event with all details
  • Sale Price Support - Tracks original price, discount amount, discount percentage
  • Security Features - Data sanitization, secure cookies, rate limiting
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to /wp-content/plugins/ga4-dynamic-tracker
  2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' screen
  3. Ensure WooCommerce is installed and activated
  4. Configure GTM to capture the dataLayer events

sections.faq:
Does this require WooCommerce?

Yes, this plugin requires WooCommerce to be installed and active.

Do I need Google Tag Manager?

Yes, configure GTM to capture the dataLayer events pushed by this plugin.
